paper_abstract: Noncommutative rational functions appeared in many contexts in system theory and control, from the theory of finite automata and formal languages to robust control and LMIs. We survey the construction of noncommutative rational functions, their realization theory and some of their applications. We also develop a difference-differential calculus as a tool for further analysis.
paper_title: Noncommutative rational functions, their difference-differential calculus and realizations
